title: Is Kingdom Come: Deliverance a nice gaming experience for a gamer passionate about the Medieval age? How faithful is it to history? Is the plot any interesting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes to all that. It is the closest you’ll get to a “Sim” of Medieval life without losing the fact that it’s a game. I believe the devs have gone to great length to portray it as accurately as possible. The plot, whilst being somewhat predictable, is certainly engaging and at times hilarious and others, thoughtful. Well worth a buy, for any history/gamer combo.
